Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Don Wittmann
Reviews.Content: It did not work.  Powered it up and light never came on.  I would never buy another one.  Whatever whatever

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Rex O. Haller
Reviews.Content: This item is junk.It made my video worse no matter what i did.It even took all the color away and made it black& white! PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM, IF YOU DO YOU WILL BE SENDING IT BACK TRUST ME

Reviews.Title: Just didn't work as promised...
Reviews.Author: JLGarcia
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure about this but i was having problems with video signal for a long cable run of a CCTV camera, so I order 3 of this, believing in the description. As soon this arrive I installed and make the quality of the image worst, I try different settings, but nothing works, and the other issues is that after try the setting and have at least the less worst image just to put the module back at the table all settings move, any movement causes to loose any settings or adjustment you make, So I returned all of them.

Reviews.Title: BNC amplificadores
Reviews.Author: Jose Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Buenos amplificadores de señal para BNC a UTP, buenos, economicos y practicos de usar. Valen la pena para alguien que no desea gastar mucho en este tipo de articulos si no lo requiere.

ProductInfo.Features:
Amplify Your Video Signal From Your Security Camera or Other Source.
1 Video Input and 1 Video Output
Input voltage: DC 12V,Input / output load: 75ohm
Input connector: 1 BNC,Output connector: 1 BNC
Frequency response: adjustable
ProductInfo.Name: Gino BNC Coaxial CCTV Video Balun Amplifier for CCTV Camera
